title: MMR: the struggle for national coverage - The Pharmaceutical Journal
author: Dawn Connelly
description: Introduction of a measles vaccine in 1968 has reduced annual cases in England from around 460,000 to less than 1,000. However, the levels of vaccine coverage needed to eradicate measles remain elusive.
cleaned_text: — symptoms Source: [World Health Organization](https://www.who.int/ihr/elibrary/manual_diagn_lab_mea_rub_en.pdf) Measles and MMR: what pharmacists need to know — complications Source: Vaccine Knowledge Project References MMR: measles, mumps and rubella Editorial adviser: Jamie Lopez Bernal, consultant epidemiologist, immunisation and countermeasures division, Public Health England. Infographic: [www.alisdairmacdonald.co.uk](http://www.alisdairmacdonald.co.uk)/ JL Last updated
